alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Robertson; Sumner; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 1:01PM CDT until July 20 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN DAVIDSON...SOUTHERN SUMNER...NORTHWESTERN WILSON AND SOUTHEASTERN ROBERTSON COUNTIES... At 101 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hendersonville, or 7 miles southwest of Gallatin, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Gallatin, Madison, Hendersonville, Mount Juliet, Goodlettsville, White House, Millersville, Greenbrier, Lakewood, Ridgetop, Hermitage, Old Hickory, Rural Hill, Green Hill, Bledsoe Creek State Park and Cottontown. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 220 and 226. Interstate 65 between mile markers 91 and 110. Interstate 24 between mile markers 36 and 39. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
